title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Budget and Financial Accountability - The Gambia

description.narrative: OTA advisor is expected to provide technical assistance the Ministry of Finance and Economic Affairs of The Gambia Directorate of Budget officials and to coordinate these efforts with the Director of Budget. The OTA Advisor intendeds to provide assistance to strengthen budget formulation, improve the application of the performance data contained in the program based budget, and formulate recommendations for the organizational structure and staffing profile for the Directorate of Budget

person-name.narrative: Andrew Velthaus, Jennifer Lee, and Kelley Vito

title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Government Debt & Infrastructure Finance - The Gambia

description.narrative: OTA intends to provide assistance to MOFEA to achieve the following objectives: Operationalization of the MOFEAs debt strategy which might include extension of the government securities maturity profile through issuance of longer-dated T-Bonds; re-profiling of the T-Bill portfolio; predictable government securities auctions; organization of market intermediaries; and improvements in government securities placement and trading and settlement procedures and infrastructure; Implementation of an appropriate organizational structure and well-defined functionalities for government debt issuance and management within the MOFEA; Enhanced MOFEA frameworks and capacity for debt strategy development; borrowing planning; fiscal risk analysis and management; portfolio risk analysis and mitigation; contingent liabilities framework; and market communication.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Government Debt and Infrastructure Finance - Gambia

description.narrative: The Debt Resident Advisor will provide technical assistance to the Ministry of Finance and Economic Affairs (MOFEA) Department of Loans and Debt Management (DLDM) for debt management operations and local currency debt market development. Project objectives include the implementation of the Medium Term Debt Strategy and developing the Gambian domestic debt market.

title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Revenue Administration and Revenue Policy - The Gambia

description.narrative: OTA is providing initial TA to the Gambia Revenue Authority on taxpayer registration, cleaning up the registration database, assigning business codes, and reviewing procedures for processing taxpayer ID registrations. Assistance in internal affairs, internal audit, risk management, and operational management, and strategic planning is slated to begin in 2019.
